title: Jon Gruden, Amari Cooper, Adrian Peterson, Lakers, and UCF
itunes:title: Jon Gruden, Amari Cooper, Adrian Peterson, Lakers, and UCF
description:
Filling in for Colin, Mark Willard and Rob Parker discusses why it's probably Black Friday for the Oakland Raiders, Dallas Cowboys WR Amari Cooper's TD celebration, the comments made by Washington Redskins RB Adrian Peterson, the current play of the Los Angeles Lakers, and if UCF should be getting more recognition.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
